`mnis` is an R package to pull data from the Members Names Information Service through the <http://data.parliament.uk/membersdataplatform/> API.



##Installing mnis

###From CRAN

install.packages("mnis")

###From GitHub (Development Version)

install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("EvanOdell/mnis")

###Load mnis

library(mnis)
